n0:createSxmlObject.n0:source: <VIEW xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/ku" version="1.0"> <SCHEMA>FCERNY</SCHEMA> <NAME>BSA_VIEW_PROJECT_NON_FIXED_SUPPLY</NAME> <DEFAULT_COLLATION>USING_NLS_COMP</DEFAULT_COLLATION> <COL_LIST> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>SUPPLY_ID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>NAME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>DESCRIPTION</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>DATEPURCHASED</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>COST</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>QUANTITY</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>PROJECT_ID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UNITCOST</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>COSTBASIS</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> </COL_LIST> <SUBQUERY>select nfqs.id as supply_id, nfqs.name, nfqs.description, nfqs.datepurchased, nfqs.cost, pt.quantity, pt.project_id, (nfqs.cost / bsa_func_get_non_fixed_supply_usages(nfqs.id)) as unitcost, ((nfqs.cost / bsa_func_get_non_fixed_supply_usages(nfqs.id)) * quantity) as costbasis from bsa_non_fixed_quantity_supply nfqs inner join bsa_project_non_fixed_quantity_supply pt on pt.supply_id = nfqs.id </SUBQUERY> </VIEW>
